abstract: Stocks decline due to lackluster company reports and forecasts as price of crude oil reached two-month nadir.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street made only small moves as the Federal Reserve opened a two-day meeting to discuss interest rates.

headline.main: Markets Dip Slightly as Investors Look to the Fed
headline.print_headline: Markets Dip Slightly as Investors Look to the Fed

snippet: Wall Street made only small moves as the Federal Reserve opened a two-day meeting to discuss interest rates.
